::: {.cell}

:::


::: {.cell}

:::

This page provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**SF2.1 Water pipes and subterranean canals**](/efg-info/SF2_1.qmd). For older or alternative maps, see [here](/map-info/SF2_1_history.qmd).

## Methods

Here is the methods summary for **Map code and version**: SF2.1.web.orig v1.0.

> Freshwater ecoregions (Abell et al. 2008) containing urban and industrialised areas with water transfer infrastructure were identified by consulting available ecoregion descriptions (http://www.feow.org/), maps of irrigation and other water infrastructure, and expertise of authors. Due to uncertainty and limited verification and likely limited spatial extent within mapped areas, all inferred occurrences were shown as minor at 30 arc seconds spatial resolution.

::: {.cell}

:::



::: {.cell}

:::



### Datasets

**FEOW-2008** (Abell et al. 2008):

Source of _biogeographical range_.
 Resolution: variable (polygons), static.
 Accuracy evaluation: qualitative (experts judgement).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset   |url                                                                                                                                 |
|:---------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|FEOW-2008 |<https://www.feow.org/>{target='links'} :: <https://geospatial.tnc.org/datasets/38da4656e8074e1c820c42cc21cd76cd_0>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Processing

Processing steps used in this map are: *Selection*.

### Map evaluation


This map is considered to be a ***Coarse quality map*** based on the following characteristics:

Concept alignment is *Indirect,general*.

Ground observations are _NA_.

 The accuracy evaluation *Qualitative expert assessment,undocumented*.

## How to use the data

### Available files

:::{.aside}

Following maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group. `Web navigation` maps are optimised for use in webapps, but they have similar methods and differ only in details of format and processing. 

- Web navigation (**code: SF2.1.web.orig**, version v1.0) 
 - Indicative Map (**code: SF2.1.IM.orig**, version v1.0) 


:::

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

**SF2.1.web.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/SF2.1.web.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091048){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](https://github.com/red-list-ecosystem/typology-map-data/blob/master/data/layers/SF2.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](layers/SF2.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"} :: [GitHub repository](SF2.1.web.orig_v1.0_topo.json){target="gisdata"}

**SF2.1.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/SF2.1.IM.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

Datasets used to create this map might have some restriction for commercial use, see details below.


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset   |license_info                                                           |
|:---------|:----------------------------------------------------------------------|
|FEOW-2008 |https://www.feow.org/copyright :: custom license :: non commercial use |


:::
:::

## References

References used in this version of the maps.

- Abell R, Thieme ML, Revenga C, Bryer M, Kottelat M, Bogutskaya N, Coad B, Mandrak N, Contreras Balderas S, Bussing W, Stiassny MLJ, Skelton P, Allen GR, Unmack P, Naseka A, Ng R, Sindorf N, Robertson J, Armijo E, Higgins JV, Heibel TJ, Wikramanayake E, Olson D, López HL, Reis RE, Lundberg JG, Sabaj Pérez MH, Petry P (2008) *Freshwater ecoregions of the world: A new map of biogeographic units for freshwater biodiversity conservation*, **BioScience** 58: 403–414.
